#include <iostream>
     
    using namespace std;
    unsigned long long s[100001];
    int ntestcases,n;
     
    int main(){
    s[0]=s[1]=s[2]=s[3]=0;
    for(int i=4; i<100001; i++){
    s[i] = s[i-1]+ (1LL*(i-1)*(i-2)/2-(i-1)/2)/2;
    }
    scanf("%d",&ntestcases);
    while(ntestcases--){
    scanf("%d",&n);
    cout <<s[n] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
    }
